item.title: OpenAI’s new voice AI model gpt-4o-transcribe lets you add speech to your existing text apps in seconds
item.description: Three, all new proprietary voice models called gpt-4o-transcribe, gpt-4o-mini-transcribe and gpt-4o-mini-tts.

item.title: Speed is King: How Google’s $32B Wiz play rewrites DevOps security rules
